Module edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u24.rcsid.hw02.gol_gui.battleship
Package edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u24.wangn4.hw03.battleship

Class BattleShipModel

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u24.wangn4.hw03.battleship.BattleShipModel
public class BattleShipModel extends Object
BattleShipModel represents the model for a Battleship game. It manages the placement of ships, tracking hits and misses, and determining the state of the game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    BattleShipModel.Ship
    Ship represents a ship with its name, position, and orientation.
    static final record 
    BattleShipModel.ShotResult
    ShotResult represents the result of a shot, indicating whether it hit and if a ship was sunk.
    static enum 
    BattleShipModel.States
    States represent the possible states of a cell in the grid.

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(int row, int col, String name, boolean isVertical)
      Places a ship on the grid if the placement is valid and the ship has not been placed yet.
      Parameters:
      row - the starting row for the ship
      col - the starting column for the ship
      name - the name of the ship
      isVertical - whether the ship is placed vertically
      Returns:
      true if the ship was placed successfully, false otherwise

    • shipAt

      @Nullable public @Nullable String shipAt(int row, int col)
      Returns the name of the ship at the specified location, if any.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to check
      col - the column to check
      Returns:
      the name of the ship at the specified location, or null if no ship is present

      Parameters:

      col - the column of the shot
      hit - whether the shot was a hit

      col - the column of the shot
      Returns:
